alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Washington (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 11:24AM EST until February 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 1 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Rain changing to freezing rain expected. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Maryland, Central and Eastern Allegany and Washington Counties. In West Virginia, Berkeley, Morgan and Jefferson Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 1 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
